price: 98. Verheerlijk dus jouw Heer met lofuitingen en wees één van degenen die (voor Hem) knielen.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
